alert.note: Alert for Brewster (Texas) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Midland-Odessa (Western Texas and Southeastern New Mexico)
info.headline: Severe Thunderstorm Warning issued May 01 at 5:51PM CDT until May 01 at 6:15PM CDT by NWS Midland-Odessa
info.description: ...A SEVERE THUNDERSTORM WARNING REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL 615 PM CDT FOR SOUTH CENTRAL BREWSTER COUNTY... At 551 PM CDT, a severe thunderstorm was located 12 miles northeast of Panther Junction, moving east at 40 mph. HAZARD...60 mph wind gusts and quarter size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Hail damage to vehicles is expected. Expect wind damage to roofs, siding, and trees. Locations impacted include... Panther Junction, Big Bend National Park and Chisos Basin. HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...1.00 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...60 MPH
info.instruction: A Tornado Watch remains in effect until 1000 PM CDT for southwestern Texas. For your protection move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a building.
